home.one:
1) Select active character
2) Select active weapon
3) Restore character health
4) Update character name

shop.one:
1) Comprar Artículos
2) Vender Artículos
3) Mejorar Artículos

pylons central.one:
1) Buy Characters
2) Buy gold with pylons
3) Sell Loud from orderbook / Create an order to buy Loud
4) Buy Loud from orderbook / Create an order to Sell Loud
5) Sell sword from orderbook / Create an order to buy sword
6) Buy sword from orderbook / Create an order to sell sword
7) Sell character from orderbook / Create an order to buy character
8) Buy character from orderbook / Create an order to sell character

develop.one:
Create cookbook(j)
Switch user(z)
Get initial py)lons
DevMode Test Items(b)

home desc.one:
Estás en inicio.
Si quieres cazar, dirígete al bosque.
Y si quieres comprar/vender algo, dirígete a la tienda.

home desc without pylon.one:
You don't have pylon within account.
To buy characters, you need to purchase pylons or sell existing characters/items on market to get pylons.

home desc without character.one:
You don't have any character yet.
You can buy one from market or at the shop

home desc with low HP.one:
Your character's health is very low.
You can restore health by spending loud or just doing rest for few mins.

forest desc.one:
Estás en el bosque.
Puedes cazar aquí o regresar a inicio.

shop desc.one:
Estás en una tienda.
Si quieres, puedes comprar o vender artículos aquí.

pylons central desc.one:
Ahora estás en un mercado.
Puedes comerciar aquí por monedas y artículos.

develop desc.one: You are now testing things for development. Please enter commands you want to try

select sell item desc.one:
